Subclass/Dual Class Master Raina:
So you have not yet completed the task
"Elixir of Mimir"

You need to create a subclass to do the job, "Elixir of Mimir". To learn about the job, visit Master Ladd in Ivory Tower of Oren.

If your race is Kamael, you need to complete "Seeds of Chaos". To find out more about this task, go to the Museum in the Talking Island Village.

To start the job "Elixir of Mimir" you should do the job "Whisper of Doom". It can be obtained from the Master Reorina, she lives in the east of Oren.
